  • Method Details

    • getRandomToken

      private String getRandomToken()
      Generated a cryptographically secure String using the 64 letters:
      [a-z][A-Z][0-9][-][_]

      Up to 64^TOKEN_LENGTH unique tokens are possible.
      Returns:
      String with the specified above format.
